revised_title: On the Absorption and Reflection of Homogeneous Particles: Part I - The Absorption of Homogeneous /3-Particles by Matter
tldr: The authors investigate the absorption and reflection of homogeneous /3-particles by matter, finding that the absorption coefficient increases with decreasing velocities of the rays. They propose that the beam becomes heterogeneous as it penetrates matter, reaching a state of equilibrium where the absorption follows an exponential law.
